'''A Magical Mix''' is a [[food]] item the player can use. Ten A Magical Mix can be obtained from the [[Mail/New Recipe Rewards (2024-07-18)|New Recipe Rewards]] mail.

A Magical Mix has a hidden effect; it regenerates 1 HP every second for 20 seconds. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]]. Unlike most foods, it does not affect [[Fullness]].

==Trivia==
* A Magical Mix is functionally identical to [[Holy Water]].
